review: Just quit working after less than two months.
author: Kris Blessing

review: It is awesome. We love it! So many movies that I liked that are available to watch some of them are even free! We get free local channels and not to mention the awesome concerts shows too! I happy with this purchase!
author: Jeffrey Fink

review: It would slow down many times . I would also have to reboot it a lot. But I loved it had a remote and it was ease to use.
author: Brooks Mixon

review: This is awesome!! Super fast shipping.. 1 day dont get any better!
author: Veronica

review: UPDATE on last review:  I spoke to my cable company and they helped me resolve my router issue which is what was causing the stall out and NOT the Amazon Fire Stick.  I take it all back.  Rock On AMAZON!!  I noticed a lot more movies become available to me once the issue did get resolved.  Fancy that, too!
author: Victoria W.

review: There is a learning curve and you have to follow it carefully. The jury is still out on its effectiveness and ease of use.
author: Robert Bone

review: Im having issues running hulu. And the netflix better menus.
author: michael j rodriguez

review: Absolutely the best thing ever!!! My kids TV is not Netflix ready so this was the perfect solution!!!! Love it!
author: marilyn horton
